marker.comment: At dock in Nyack. Visiting famiy. Move N on the 5th. All is well
At dock in Albany. Start Erie Canal tomorrow. Sorry about few updates. Poor TX
Tied up alongside the Eire Canal in Amsterdam, NY. Continue W and N tomorrow
Tied up alongside the Eire Canal in Fort Plain NY Locke 15. ; am
At Oneida Lake for 2 days to take visitors to JFK. Then to Oswego Canal
Stopped at Brewerton awaiting a new H2O pump for the genset. N tomo.
@ Trenton. Headup the Trent-Severen Canal tomorrow. Mike/Kayta on board
At Cambellford after 12 locks. Great day. Further N tomorrow
Anchored in Stoney Lake. Beautiful!! Going to stay another day.
At the entrance of Lake Simcoe. Cross the lake tomorrow. Beaut WX
At Penetanguishene on Georgian Bay. Great! Donr with 45 locks on T-S
Anchored off Bernadette I. on Georgian Bay.; Beautiful! No more locks.
Anchored near Moon I. on Georgian Bay.; Beautiful! All is good!!
Leaving Parry Sound for an anchorage to the west.
Docked @ Britt ON to wait out lousy weather. On NW in the AM.
Anchored off Manitowaning ON. Lovely bay. Here for the 2nd nite.
Anchored in our own cove on Baie Fine. A true fiord. All is well.
Docked at Little Current, ON just before major thunderstorm. Exciting!
Docked at Blind River, ON. Go to Drummond I. tommorrow (USA)
At Drummond I. (USA) Delayed @ Blind River by bad WX. All is well.
Ending 2 days @ Mackinaw City. Visited Macinac I. All is well.
Visited Beaver I. and now in Northport. To Traverse City tomorrow.
Ending 2 days @ Charlevoix. Nice town but rainy. On to Petoshey.
Anchored @ South Manitou I. WX getting better. To Portage L. 2day
At Manistee. Didn't go to Portage L. Further S tocday. All is well.
Anchored @ Pentwater. Band concert in the park-great fun!
Docked @ White Lake YC. Melges 17 Nationals here.
Docked @ White Lake Muni marina. Head S tomorrow. All is well.
Docked @ South Haven. Visited Grand Haven and southbound AM
Docked at Mammond, IN @ the S end of Lake Mich. Here for 10 days
Still @ Hammond. Move to Chicago Yacht Club tomorrow for a few days.
Now @ Chicago Yacht Club right downtown. Great!
Left chicago and now in Joliet-I didi something bad. All is well.
After a stop Joliet and Seneca, we are @ Hennepin, IL. All is well.
After a stop in Peoria, we are tied up to Barge MWB501 in Beardsville, IL.
Tied up in Hardin, IL. Tomorrow the Mighty Mississip. Hot, but all is well.
Departing Alton IL to go further down the Mississip. Hot, but all is well.
2 long runs down the Miss. R and now @ the Cumberland R in KY.
Berthed @ Green Turtle Bay on Lake Barkley, KY. All is well.
Anchored in Leatherwood Creek, TN. Great spot, all is well.
Docked @ Mermaid Marina as we continue south. All is well.
Docked @ Aqua Marina, Ikua,MS. TN and AL are all within 5 mi.
Docked @ Wheeler State Park, Rogersville,AL. On to Chatanooga
Docked in downtown Chatanooga, TN. Here for 3 days and back to MS.
